content: It seems that DaVinci Plan Net Client - https://plan-net-client.herokuapp.comÂ  is down. Can anyone confirm if they are able to use it? Thanks
@Saul Kravitz & @Dave Hill - Please help to get access to Plan Net Client.
@Saul Kravitz Please suggest when can we expect the Pdex Plan Net Client available for usage?
Hi @Ankita Srivastava - apologies for the delay. Still a work in progress. Certainly before the January connectathon. @Dave Hill
@Saul Kravitz Thank you for the response. Will wait for the working client. Thanks
